jd: From: Anushka Mishra, TIA INFOTEK anushka.m@tiainfotek.com Reply to: anushka.m@tiainfotek.com Job Overview: We are seeking a highly motivated Agile Project Manager to join our dynamic team. The ideal candidate will have a strong understanding of Agile methodologies, excellent leadership skills, and the ability to manage multiple projects simultaneously. You will be responsible for facilitating Agile processes, ensuring project delivery within scope, time, and budget, and fostering a culture of continuous improvement.Key Responsibilities:Lead and facilitate Agile ceremonies, including daily stand-ups, sprint planning, retrospectives, and backlog grooming.Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define project scope, goals, and deliverables.Manage project timelines, budgets, and resources to ensure successful delivery.
